summary: Greatly decreases the rate at which your character increases individual skills (one handed, destruction, ECT) in hope of keeping the character with in every level for a very long time.
descriptionHtml:
Greatly decreases the rate at which your character increases individual skills (one handed, destruction, ECT) in hope of keeping the character with in every level for a very long time. 

I did this because i really like spending a good amount of time at every level on par with my enemies trying to make everything fair and challenging throughout the entire experience.

mods for the future if i can find out how to do them
disabled leveled item list (so if you find a unique weapon it doesn\'t suck, it is whats its suppose to be)
disabled leveled enemy items (so that enemies carry appropriate weapons-- example: i hate how the thalmar have steel weapons at early levels)
greater faction classes (so certain factions can be more individualized and unique)
and what every you guys suggest 

Recommended mods to compliment this one
Weapon Variants Expansion (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10902)
HBE (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4429)--with or without jaysus swords and weapons of the third era (i recommend with)

Disclaimer:
This mod is definitely not for every one(this mods slows things close to 10x slower) may cause a lot of grinding and tedium for most players

All credit should go to Ardvarko for the original and for inspiration for this mod
author: Moondogy
